Afterwards, Kirsten Gillibrand said, the doctor declared it to be a major step forward for the patient. We had been telling her that she was inspiring the country with her courage and that we couldn't wait to take her out to pizza and a weekend away, Kirsten Gillibrand said through a spokeswoman.`` Then, after she heard our voices and the encouragement of Mark and her parents, she struggled briefly and opened her eyes for the very first time. From a defensive standpoint, you've got to keep him from controlling the game and monopolizing the game. That's what we have to try and do with Aaron Rodgers . He's a great player. He can create, improvise with his feet, go to his second and third choice in the route because he has such a quick release. The 6-foot-5, 241-pound Ben Roethlisberger isn't as speedy as Aaron Rodgers or Michael Vick nor as statuesque as Tom Brady and Peyton Manning ; he just makes it work. announced Thursday that co-founder Larry Page, pictured in 2007, would replace Eric Schmidt as chief executive of the Internet giant in April. Google said Eric Schmidt would remain with the company as executive chairman and focus on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships. The firm's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , will work on strategic projects and new products, Google said in a statement. It said the management changes would take effect on April 4.

Michael Vick , 30, was selected to start Sunday after leading the NFC with more than 1.5 million votes, far ahead of Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson , the NFC's second-leading vote-getter at 948,410. I'm going to try to put on a great show for the fans, Michael Vick said. Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 John McCain House race.`` I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified,'' he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either.
